page.title: 07A Den in my Bedroom
page.content: If it's{raining}and cold outside I go upstairs to my{bedroom}and make a {den.}The first thing I do is to get some{blankets}and lay them on the floor.Then I get my{ladder}from my bunk bed unit and prop it up against the cupboard door.Next I get my brother's ladder from his bedroom and put it on my bed.I take the first blanket and put it over the two ladders.If the one blanket is not big enough I spread two or three over this framework until they touch the floor. Then I go into my den to arrange some{cushions}for seats and I also put a small{table}in it to make it look like a little house. When my friends come round to play,we play in the den and sometimes my Mum lets us{have lunch}in the den.It feels very cosy and secretive. TECLA LAMPREY
